post.body: Is ZeroID the only place you can register a username? I keep losing my usernames, won't there just be a load that end up in the void?

I'm pretty sure this will not happen to ZeroNet for a very long time mainly because of how hard it is to kill a website once it has seeders https://www.bleepingcomputer.com/news/security/the-dark-web-has-shrunk-by-85-percent/
Wonder if Steve Gibson's SQRL has anything to do with this https://wikileaks.org/ciav7p1/cms/page_524393.html

comment.body: @Watcher: What other sites are there for doing it?
